title: Hey guys, I just started college
body:
That means I already finished my degree with a 4.0 GPA, I am making millions an hour, and I am totally jacked.

I am supposed to know everything but can you please help me pick out a computer for my engineering degree? It must be able to play high quality solitaire games or else all that money my parents saved is going to be wasted on their mortgage payments.

Tee hee, my big IQ and muscles are so great.

Oh and I'm marrying my cousin, MLB, in June.

Post your personality type or gtfo.

**OMG MODS PLEASE STOP THE BULLIES FROM ABUSING MY EGO!!**

**SAFE SPACE GODS SAVE ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!**

http://i.imgur.com/yWGlalI.png
